IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THREE SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA COMMUNITY FOUNDATIONS AND FACILITATE CHARITABLE GIVING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SPECIFIC PURPOSE OF THIS CORPORATION IS TO SUPPORT THE DESERT COMMUNITY FOUNDATION, THE CALIFORNIA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION AND THE ORANGE COUNTY COMMUNITY FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RECIPIENTS REQUIRED TO SUBMIT REPORT ON RESULTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL TAX DOCUMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY RESPONSIBLE PARTIES BEFORE THEY ARE FILED WITH THE TAX AUTHORITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION OBTAINS AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT SIGNED BY EACH MEMBER AND OFFICER OR, IF NOT PREVIOUSLY DISCLOSED IN SUCH STATEMENT, WHEN THE MATTER AT INTEREST FIRST COMES UP OR SHOULD COME UP FOR CONSIDERATION BY SUCH BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
